extension.summary: Bluetooth manager, allows to pair and connect devices.
Bluetooth Manager, erlaubt das Koppeln und Verbinden von Geräten.
extension.description: A bluetooth manager to pair and connect devices. This implementation is based on dbus interface.
Ein Bluetooth Manager,um Geräte zu koppeln und verbinden. Diese Implementierung basiert auf dem DBus Interface.
extension.news: v1.0.6 - Add support for SSP (Secure Simple Pairing) authentication methods - Implement RequestPasskey, DisplayPasskey, DisplayPinCode handlers - Implement RequestConfirmation and RequestAuthorization handlers - Remove pre-trust call that caused pairing rejection by bluez - Auto-confirm and auto-authorize for headless operation - Fixes 'pairing rejected by bluez' error with modern smartphones v1.0.5 - allows a peer BT device can trigger pairing via a PIN. Add switch to enable autotrust. v1.0.4 - try to connect with a2dp profile first v1.0.3 - remove addon lock when kodi starts and remove device is selected v1.0.2 - added skin support for many skins - ensure that only one instance of the addon is running for stability - block user input while paring, connecting for stability v1.0.1 - included into linux addon repository v1.0.0 - Initial Version
